1370: Folpertus was born in Cromme straet in 1370.
Got married to Lutghardis at age 36 in 1370.
Had a son with Lutghardis, Blankard, at age 36.
Lost son Blankard when Blankard was 1 years old.
1371: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Leanne, at age 37.
1372: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Myrthel, at age 38.
1374: Had a son with Lutghardis, Nanne, at age 40.
1375: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Ryccie, at age 41.
1379: Had a son with Lutghardis, Hylonus, at age 45.
1382: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Agnes, at age 48.
1383: Had a son with Lutghardis, Nannekin, at age 49.
Lost daughter Agnes when Agnes was 2 years old.
1385: Had a daughter with Lutghardis, Siwa, at age 51.
1387: Lost son Hylonus when Hylonus was 9 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
